approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.

requirements.title: Fast Loading Time
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly.

requirements.title: Secure Application
requirements.description: The application shall be secure.

requirements.title: View Task List

requirements.title: Fast Loading Time
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly.

requirements.title: Secure Application
requirements.description: The application shall be secure.

extracted_requirements.title: Create Task
extracted_requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description.

extracted_requirements.title: View Task List
extracted_requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.

extracted_requirements.title: Create Task
extracted_requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description.

extracted_requirements.title: View Task List
extracted_requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.

original_functional_requirements.title: Create Task
original_functional_requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description.
acceptance_criteria: A text input field is available for the user to enter the task description.
A button or other UI element is available to submit the task creation.
Upon successful task creation, a confirmation message is displayed to the user.
The task description is saved and associated with the user (implicitly, as no user management is mentioned).

original_functional_requirements.title: View Task List
original_functional_requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.
acceptance_criteria: The list of tasks is displayed in a clear and readable format.
Each task in the list displays its text description.
The list is updated automatically after a new task is created.
The list displays all tasks created by the user, regardless of the number.

original_non_functional_requirements.title: Fast Loading Time
acceptance_criteria: The initial page load time shall be less than 3 seconds.
Subsequent page loads (e.g., after creating a task) shall be less than 2 seconds.
The application should be responsive during loading (e.g., display a loading indicator).

original_non_functional_requirements.title: Secure Application
acceptance_criteria: Data transmitted between the client and server shall be encrypted (e.g., using HTTPS).
The application shall protect against common web vulnerabilities (e.g., XSS, CSRF).
Sensitive data (e.g., user data, if any) shall be stored securely (e.g., encrypted at rest).
The application should not expose sensitive information in error messages.
